body: Hi Abraham I tested your file, I think the problem in this special cases should be the method of the component, if I understand well, the component projects each shading surfaces using the relative vector onto the optional surface. Then it joins them together, I haven't read the code of the component but I have imaged something like that. Hi Mostapha Is it right, Mostapha? I have thought another method and maybe it should be easier, obviously we have to see if it true for all cases. These are some images of the result of this alternative method.
